results.title: Safety of Chronic Simvastatin Treatment in Patients with Decompensated Cirrhosis: Many Adverse Events but No Liver Injury.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received standard treatment throughout the trial plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg/day for 2 weeks and thereafter @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg/day up to 1 year.

results.title: Simvastatin-induced Changes in the Leukocytic System of Porcine Bone Marrow
results.text_hl: Unfortunately, it shows numerous side effects. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ affects various internal organs, and among other detriments to health may cause persistent @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@, @DISEASE_Pathologic_Processes @DISEASE_MESH:D010335 @@@osteolytic processes@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headaches@@@, and @DISEASE_Exanthema @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@rashes@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin in the treatment of hypercholesterolaemia in patients with essential hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ effectively lowered total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ and improved the lipoprotein profile.

results.title: Simvastatin and vitamin D for migraine prevention: A randomized, controlled trial.
results.text_hl: INTERPRETATION: The results demonstrate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D@@@ is effective for prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Headache</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ in adults with @DISEASE_Migraine_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D008881 @@@episodic migraine@@@.

citations.NLM: Buettner C, Nir RR, Bertisch SM, Bernstein C, Schain A, Mittleman MA, Burstein R. Simvastatin and vitamin D for migraine prevention: A randomized, controlled trial. Ann Neurol. 2015 Dec;78(6):970-81. PMID: 26418341
